1.vid: /0/05/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 1 Version 2.360p.mp4

2.vid: /0/02/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.vid: /d/da/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Consider how you will measure the cuts to make the ties.
4.vid: /2/28/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Cut out a rectangle from both corners with a pair of scissors (see tips).
5.vid: /6/63/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.vid: /1/1a/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.vid: /6/6d/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.vid: /0/06/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Tie the strips at the end between the two corners next in the same way.
9.vid: /7/73/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.vid: /c/c1/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

11.text: Tie the strips down each side for the length of the blanket.
11.vid: /6/62/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.vid: /b/bb/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 12 Version 2.360p.mp4

13.vid: /8/83/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 13 Version 2.360p.mp4

14.text: Trim end and sides as needed.
14.vid: /5/5c/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.vid: /1/1d/Make a Fleece Tie Blanket Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4
